content:
[Pennsylvania Senate 2022 | Scranton/NEPA (Lackawanna County) | P1: M, 52, Warehouse worker, Dunmore, registered Democrat but voted Trump 2016, back to Biden 2020]
Q: Thanks everyone for being here tonight. Let's start by talking about life here in Northeastern Pennsylvania. How are things going for you and your families?
"I've lived here my whole life. Worked at the distribution center for 15 years. It's a decent job but the cost of everything is eating my paycheck. Gas to get to work, groceries, my daughter's about to go to college and I don't know how we're going to pay for it."
participant_profile: M, 52, Warehouse worker, Dunmore, registered Democrat but voted Trump 2016, back to Biden 2020

He's never worked a day in his life."
